title: HOW OP IS RAGEBLADE KAYLE?!

embed.description: Step one is the get the rageblade that works perfectly with kayles E ability Step 2 is to get a nashers tooth which will increase her basic attack damage Step 3 is to get a witz end which will also increase her basic attack damage Step 4 is hurrican to abuse extra attack attack from the rage blade and to also abuse her extra auto attack damage.

body:
Step one is the get the rageblade that works perfectly with kayles E ability 

Step 2 is to get a nashers tooth which will increase her basic attack damage

Step 3 is to get a witz end which will also increase her basic attack damage

Step 4 is hurrican to abuse extra attack attack from the rage blade and to also abuse her extra auto attack damage.

How op is rageblade kayle? lets find out

replies.body:
[Not as good as your nashors braum it seems.](http://i.imgur.com/4Afmw4a.jpg)

But seriously, Kayle is weak in the current meta, gank her before 6 for freelo. And rageblade is too expensive to be a first or second item.
yeh i completely agree but i thought it might be a good idea to try out haha
